com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.taskdata

Class LabelReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.taskdata.LabelReader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExecutorLabelReader, SchedulerLabelReader

    public class LabelReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements common logic for read access to a task's Labels. Any access to component-specific values is provided by ExecutorLabelReader and SchedulerLabelReader.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected LabelReader(TaskInfo.Builder taskInfoBuilder)
      Creates a new instance for reading the provided task builder's labels.
      protected LabelReader(TaskInfo taskInfo)
      Creates a new instance for reading the provided task's labels.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getOptional(java.lang.String key)
      Returns the requested label value, or an empty Optional if the value was not found.
      protected java.lang.String getOrThrow(java.lang.String key)
      Returns the requested label value, or throws an exception if the value was not found.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
